name: Steve's Adventure - Post Compo
description:
Steve's Adventure - Post-CompoDESCRIPTION:

This game was made for Ludum Dare and this is a post version of the game where I have fixed a lot of issues and implemented some new mechanics.

Steve's Adventure is a Platform Jumper where the objective is to reach the green flag on top of the level, but do not hesitate or the ground you stand on will literally fall.

CONTROLS:
  • A - Move left
  • D - Move right
  • Spacebar - Jump


Press spacebar twice to doublejump!

Leaving the viewport will teleport the player to the opposite side! Use this ability to overcome obstacles.

RECOMMENDED RESOLUTION: 848 x 480
ASPECT RATIO: 16:9
